name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
variant: Lantern Rite Special Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup

normal.description: A steaming egg dish. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.
normal.effect: Decreases all party members'sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s.

delicious.description: A steaming egg dish. The succulent eggs melt right in your mouth, and before you know it, a smooth and subtle sweetness of newly sprung lotus flowers covers your tastebuds.
delicious.effect: Decreases all party members'sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s.

suspicious.description: A steaming egg dish. The lengthy steaming process has caused unusual honeycomb figure to appear on the surface of the egg custard. It goes without saying that there isn't hardly a hint of bitterness left in the lotus.
suspicious.effect: Decreases all party members'sprinting Stamina consumption by 15% for 900s.
